title-group.article-title: Automatically Creating Lexical Entries for ULTRA, a Multilingual MT System

abstract.p: In this paper, we describe both a multi-lingual, interlingual MT system (ULTRA) and a method of extracting lexical entries for it automatically from an existing machine-readable dictionary (LDOCE). We believe the latter is original and the former, although not the first interlingual MT System by any means, may be the first that is symmetrically multi-lingual. It translates between English, German, Chinese, Japanese and Spanish and has vocabularies in each language based on about 10,000 word senses.
